entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having trouble concentrating due to a blank buzzing in his brain.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is irritated with him for not being able to read on his ship.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: A student who slouches in and looks surly at the pair of them.

entities.name: bulgaria
entities.description: Mentioned as a country whose scarf is being worn by one of the girls.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are interacting in the library, with Hermione trying to get Harry to leave.
Harry and Viktor Krum are sitting near each other in the library.
